name: Action Multi Ratings
about: Action Multi Ratings is a reputable and experienced flight school located at the Groton-New London Airport in Connecticut. We offer a comprehensive range of flight training programs, including private pilot licenses, instrument ratings, and bi-annual flight reviews. Our instructors, Joel, Ryan, and Nate, are highly skilled and dedicated to providing top-notch training. We specialize in multi-engine instruction, offering combination courses that lead to a Commercial Pilot Certificate with both single-engine and multi-engine ATP ratings. Our training encompasses both ground and flight instruction, covering all necessary areas to ensure pilots are fully prepared for their checkrides. With a focus on quality and safety, Action Multi Ratings is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals.
services:

Airline Transport Pilot ATP
